name: Orrery, Epistolary
description:
In this game, you confront the sublime. Then you help the sublime with their love life. A demo for a longer top-down solar-system arcade game.

Controls: 

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar and Return for some interactions (will be obvious)
  • Arrow keys to navigate dialogue choices

All visual assets are mine, but many thanks to Matthew Slayton (MatthewSlayton.com) for sound design!
